#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

bool order(const int &a, const int &b)
{
	int temp_a;
	int temp_b;
	int digits_a;
	int digits_b;
	int sum1;
	int sum2;

	digits_a = 0;
	temp_a = a;

	while (temp_a > 0)
	{
		digits_a++;
		temp_a /= 10;
	}

	digits_b = 0;
	temp_b = b;

	while (temp_b > 0)
	{
		digits_b++;
		temp_b /= 10;
	}

	sum1 = (int)(a * pow((double)10, digits_b)) + b;
	sum2 = (int)(b * pow((double)10, digits_a)) + a;

	return (sum1 < sum2);
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	int x;
	int n;
	string s;
	vector<int> v;

	scanf("%d", &t);

	for (int i = 0; i < t; i++)
	{
		scanf("%d", &x);

		v.clear();

		for (int j = 0; j < x; j++)
		{
			scanf("%d", &n);

			v.push_back(n);
		}

		sort(v.begin(), v.end(), order);

		for (int j = v.size() - 1; j >= 0; j--)
		{
			printf("%d", v.at(j));
		}

		printf("\n");
	}
}
